items.sentence: Anyone who can only think of one way to spell a word obviously lacks imagination.
After reading Tom\'s forum post, Mary resisted the impulse to post a crude reply.
He says that he saw nothing. However, I don\'t believe what he says is the truth.
We don\'t have a lot of money, but we have enough to buy what we absolutely need.
We got this chair for nothing because the lady next door didn\'t want it anymore.
